name: Highway Race
description:
Welcome to Highway Race

Your car brakes break on the highway and you will lose control of your beast...

There is only one solution, master the car and drive to hell ! Jump bridge, run beach, travel forest, slide between car, cross the desert and more !!!

If you want more sensation a highspeed mode is available in game.

There is also a zombie mode available to drive in dead city and hit some zombies.
